name: Legendary Dungeon
description:
This game just now is the prototype of my game. I'll try to update it every month. 

You can for now only run/jump around and there is a golden Frog collectible and the first enemy is moving onto battlefield . The respawn system will be added soon so you dont have to close the game,  next update will feature a working Menu if you press Esc the Game crashes so its planned to call up a Menu for exiting the game and Reloading it.

We are working on this game since 2017, due to our lack of experience and us only being 2 people working this game will not be great, we still hope we can publish this game before 2023.

-Toasted Gears
